itemLabel: Robert Verney, 17th Baron Willoughby de Broke

wikipedia_page.main: Robert John Verney, 17th Baron Willoughby de Broke and de jure 25th Baron Latimer (7 October 1809 – 5 June 1862) (born Barnard) of Compton Verney in Warwickshire, was a peer in the peerage of England.

response: *Georgiana Jane Taylor, wife of Robert Verney, 17th Baron Willoughby de Broke (1809-1862)  of Compton Verney in Warwickshire.
